% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	&& \ell \\
	\\
	&& T\ell \\
	{TDj_{1}} &&&& {TDj_{2}} \\
	&& \ell \\
	{Dj_{1}} &&&& {Dj_{2}}
	\arrow["{\eta_{\ell}}", from=1-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["\alpha", from=3-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow["{\gamma_{1}}"', from=4-1, to=6-1]
	\arrow["{\gamma_{2}}", from=4-5, to=6-5]
	\arrow["{T\lambda_{j_{1}}}"{description}, from=3-3, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{T\lambda_{j_{2}}}"{description}, from=3-3, to=4-5]
	\arrow["{\lambda_{j_{1}}}"', from=5-3, to=6-1]
	\arrow["{\lambda_{j_{2}}}", from=5-3, to=6-5]
	\arrow["{T\lambda_{j_{1}}\eta_{\ell}}"', curve={height=6pt}, from=1-3, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{T\lambda_{j_{2}}\eta_{\ell}}", curve={height=-6pt}, from=1-3, to=4-5]
	\arrow[curve={height=12pt}, dashed, from=1-3, to=5-3]
	\arrow[from=6-1, to=6-5]
\end{tikzcd}\]
